sentences.en: a country no longer willing to &B{bend its knee to} foreign powers.
sentences.cn: 一个再也不愿向外国列强屈服的国家。

sentences.en: a country no longer willing to &B{bend its knee to} foreign powers.
sentences.cn: 一个再也不愿向外国列强屈服的国家。

sentences.en: a horseshoe bend in the river
sentences.cn: 河道中的马蹄形弯曲

sentences.en: A minority of officers were prepared to bend the rules.
sentences.cn: 少数官员准备篡改规则。

sentences.en: Arms bend. Arms upward. Wait for it. Stretch.
sentences.cn: 手臂弯曲。手臂上举。保持一下。伸展。

sentences.en: Bend the bar into a horseshoe.
sentences.cn: 把铁条弯成马蹄形。

sentences.en: Bend your knees, but keep your back straight.
sentences.cn: 膝盖弯曲，背部保持挺直。

sentences.en: Congress has to bend to his will.
sentences.cn: 国会不得不屈从于他的意志。

sentences.en: Do you think she's likely to bend on her attitude to Europe?
sentences.cn: 你认为她会改变对欧洲的态度吗？

sentences.en: Don't bend the book back, and you'll damage it.
sentences.cn: 别向后卷书, 会弄坏的.

sentences.en: Don't bend the corners of the pages down, it damages them.
sentences.cn: 别折那些书页的角, 会弄坏的.

sentences.en: Emma bent over to pick up the coins.
sentences.cn: 埃玛弯腰去捡硬币。

sentences.en: I'd &B{go round the bend} looking after kids all day.
sentences.cn: 整天照顾孩子我会发疯的。

sentences.en: it used to &B{drive} my wife &B{round the bend}.
sentences.cn: 这事以前老是让我妻子发疯。

sentences.en: Lee bent and kissed her.
sentences.cn: 李俯下身来亲她。

sentences.en: Let's bend our way to the Museum of Natural History.
sentences.cn: 咱们改道往自然博物馆走吧.

sentences.en: People thought I was round the bend.
sentences.cn: 人们以为我疯了。

sentences.en: Several branches started bending towards the ground.
sentences.cn: 数根枝条开始向地面弯垂。

sentences.en: She bent her head.
sentences.cn: 她低下头。

sentences.en: Steel barriers can bend and absorb the shock.
sentences.cn: 钢制栅栏可以弯曲并能吸收冲击力。

sentences.en: The branch began to bend as I climbed along it.
sentences.cn: 我沿树枝爬时它弯了下来.

sentences.en: The car came round the bend at a terrifying speed.
sentences.cn: 那辆汽车以惊人的速度拐过弯道。

sentences.en: The car disappeared round the bend in the road.
sentences.cn: 车子转过公路的拐弯处就不见了.

sentences.en: The driver failed to negotiate a bend and ran into a tree.
sentences.cn: 司机没能顺利拐弯，撞到了树上。

sentences.en: There wasn't room to stand up and he had to bend double.
sentences.cn: 空间太小无法站直，他不得不弓着身子。

sentences.en: You need a special tool to bend the steel.
sentences.cn: 你要用特殊的工具才能把这钢条弄弯。

words.tran_cn: 饮酒作乐；扭弯物体的人；六便士银币
弯曲；使屈从；决意（bend的过去分词形式之一）

phrases.tran_cn: 谈论不休：长时间地交谈，通常是过分详细地谈论
下定决心做某事；增速；系住
(非正式)（尤指迫切地或为了请求帮助而）喋喋不休地缠住某人，与某人纠缠
（尤指在恳求或表示尊敬时）下跪
南本德（美国印第安纳州北部城市）

trans.tran_cn: 拐弯处，弯道，弯曲，屈肢症
trans.tran_en: a curved part of something, especially a road or river

trans.tran_cn: 弯腰，（使）弯曲，屈从，拐弯，篡改，歪曲
trans.tran_en: to become curved and no longer flat or straight
to move part of your body so that it is not straight or so that you are not upright
to become curved and no longer flat or straight
